description: The 60 year old had a tumour removed as she stuffed 90 olives in an operating theatre.
title: Italian woman prepares olives during brain tumour operation
title_page: Italian woman prepares olives during brain tumour operation - BBC News
maintext: Awake brain surgery, as it is known, is used to treat some neurological conditions such as tumours that affect the areas of the brain responsible for vision, movement or speech. To help the surgeon try to inflict minimal damage on healthy tissue, the patient can be asked questions or engaged in an activity during the operation.
